subject: Re: [junit] junit installatation
msgSnippet: ... The space in the class path ( Program Files ) might be a problem. Can we see the entire command you re using to launch the test runners? -- J. B. (Joe)
messageBody:
ANH wrote:
> now it works but with textui only
> can't with swing or awt

The space in the class path ("Program Files") might be a problem. Can we
see the entire command you're using to launch the test runners?
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
